post:
[**HostInfuse** ](**https://hostinfuse.com**)is a webhosting provider which provides top-quality hosting at an affordable price. 
At Hostinfuse , we recognize that all projects have different goals & requirements and our support 
will work tirelessly to ensure each and every one of our customers has their needs met. 
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
**_Current Promotion_**
Save 25% for life on all Shared Hosting plans! This is a recurring discount that applies to all billing cycles.
 
Use promotional code "**LETLOVE**" at checkout. We accept PayPal and Bitcoin.
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
**_<del>Main Features</del>_**
 
* Technical Support Available 24/7/365
* 14 Day Money Back Guarantee 
* 99.9% Uptime Guarantee
* Latest cPanel and Softaculous
* Free cPanel To cPanel Migration Service
* PHP Selector - Version 5.5, 5.6 or 7.0
* Configure PHP Modules And Extensions
* 1 Gbps Uplink Port Speeds
* Hardware RAID 10 Protected Pure SSD's
* Latest Stable MariaDB Server Version
* Free Integrated CloudFlare cPanel Plugin
* Free SSL Certificates
* Instant Setup
 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
**_Personal_** -  $2.95 Per Month - Now Just $2.20!<ul><li>4GB Pure SSD Disk Space</li> <li>50GB Premium Bandwidth</li>
<li>One Hosted Domain</li></ul>
[Order Now](https://hostinfuse.com/panel/cart.php?a=add&pid=1)
 
**_Professional_**- $4.95 Per Month -Now Just $3.70!
<ul><li>8GB Pure SSD Disk Space</li>
<li>120GB Premium Bandwidth</li>
<li>Three Hosted Domains</li></ul>
[Order Now](https://hostinfuse.com/panel/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)
 
**_Business_**- $6.95 Per Month - Now Just $5.2!
<ul><li>15GB Pure SSD Drive</li>
<li>300GB Premium Bandwidth</li>
<li>Unlimited Hosted Domain</li></ul>
[Order Now](https://hostinfuse.com/panel/cart.php?a=add&pid=3)
